abstract: Tabloid attention has turned to diet and nutrition expert Dr Mark Hyman, adviser to Bill and Hillary Clinton, as Hillary contemplates second run for presidency and her health comes under scrutiny.
lead_paragraph: As Hillary Rodham Clinton contemplates another run for the presidency, few topics receive more scrutiny than her health, turning tabloid attention to the doctor who advises her and the former president.

headline.main: He Tells the Clintons How to Lose a Little
headline.print_headline: He Tells the Clintons How to Lose
headline.seo: Dr. Mark Hyman: Advising the Clintons on Their Health

snippet: As Hillary Rodham Clinton contemplates another run for the presidency, few topics receive more scrutiny than her health, turning tabloid attention to the doctor who advises her and the former president....
